divs: Sighting DetailsIn the Mid-70s during the summer, the witness and her cousin turned east on FM 2861 from hwy 16 just north of Comanche, Texas. They saw a huge formation of red lights in a cylindrical shape heading toward the ground. The lights were very wide in the middle of the shape but not on each end. As it got very close to the ground, the red lights turned bright white, scattered, and disappeared.
Summary: Witness A observed a cylindrical formation of red lights coming down from the sky and lights turned white then scattered and disappeared.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Comanche
There were no other sightings in Comanche on or around July 15th 1975
